input.sentences: [male] was the perfect husband and [female] knew it . she always felt like the most luckiest woman in the world when he 'd cook her breakfast in the mornings .
she 'd always get so emotional . [male] would say cut that out [female] | i 've cooked for you for over six years already .
he 'd prepare her surprise dinners as well . particularly the nights she worked late .
she 'd always smother him with hugs and kisses for it . [male] would smile | knowing that he was loved .
they 'd eat to their hearts content | drink up all the juice | shower | and then get into bed together . they 'd talk until they fell asleep in each others arms .
output.sentences: The whole world knows, any woman who makes you lunch, is pretty much perfect.
Females are more emotional than males.
Men, however, will surprise women and make dinner some nights.
If he cooks well enough, he may be rewarded by being smothered in kisses and a warm smile.
Men should also impress her lady by talking to her everyday, and showering her in juice.
